[[Image:SLAX 5.0.6.png|thumb|250px|SLAX 5.0.6]]
'''SLAX''' is a Linux [[Live CD]] [[operating system]] based on [[Slackware]]. It does not need to be installed on a computer system's [[hard drive]]; it boots and runs from either a [[CD]] or [[USB drive]]. There is also an option to run SLAX from [[Random access memory|RAM]].
'''SLAX''' is a Linux [[Live CD]] [[operating system]] based on [[Slackware]]. It does not need to be installed on a computer system's [[hard drive]]; it boots and runs from either a [[CD]] or [[USB drive]]. There is also an option to run SLAX from [[Random access memory|RAM]].
